TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AnnotationPathPointCollection extends System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartElementCollection`1<class System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationPathPoint>

Docs.summary: Represents a collection of or path points, which can be accessed using the `GraphicPathPoints` property.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This collection is used at design time only, and employs serialization to expose the shape of a polyline or polygon annotation, using their respective `GraphicPathPoints` collection properties.
At run time, use the `GraphicsPath` property to set the path of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.PolylineAnnotation> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.PolygonAnnotation>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.PolylineAnnotation annotation) cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified polyline annotation.
